entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
